plptool.gui

Class PLPToolApp

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jdesktop.application.AbstractBean
      • org.jdesktop.application.Application
        • org.jdesktop.application.SingleFrameApplication
          • plptool.gui.PLPToolApp

  • public class PLPToolApp
extends org.jdesktop.application.SingleFrameApplication
    This is the main class of PLPTool. This class handles command line arguments and sets up the environment for PLPTool execution. This class is responsible for setting up runtime environments (app properties), loading dynamic modules specified in command line arguments, initiating module autoload procedure, and determining next phase of execution (GUI or command line).

      • getImage

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage getImage(java.lang.String key)
        Get an image from the image collection loaded in PLPToolApp
        Parameters:
        key - Image key (filename in JAR with slashes replaced by periods)
        Returns:
        BufferedImage object of the image. A default image will be returned if the key was not found
